replyText:
Tap the icon and don't release your finger before a popup menu shows up. In the same moment, a trashcan icon should show near the top of the screen. Without releasing your finger, drag the app's icon to the trashcan.
If the trashcan does not show up, it might be bcs the icon is not on the main screen. Drag the icon to the main screen and try again.
